views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11.

ringUI gives you the visual options to Make Square some Features in the UI of the Device like: the Dots, Folders (also inside), Notifications, NC, Today View, Alerts, Switcher Cards and Toggles in the CC.

You can also choose- individually or combined- what kind of Features for making Square like: the Control Center, the App Switcher Cards and the PassCode View on LockScreen).

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Credits: Thanks @prouser by Flex Community for the nice conception in making this Tweak.

Version 1.0.2-3
- Added the Full iOS 11 Compatibility.
- Changes in Prefs Labels Panel.
- Fixes.
- Improvements.
Version 1.0.2-1
- Put the option about Square Balloons on Text Messages in Beta Stage since some users reported issues (not really working at all for now).


Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Make Square the Balloons Text on Messages.
- Small change in Prefs.
